com.MASTAdView
Class MASTAdDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.MASTAdView.MASTAdDelegate

public final class MASTAdDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

The delegate class defines interfaces developers can use to extend and/or interact with feature and functions of the SDK ad handling, including:

  • Ad download events and errors
  • Rich media events (MRAID open, expand, etc.)
  • Activities affected the ad view (clicks, resize, etc.)
  • Third party ad events (client side hand-off for third party SDKs)
  • Feature support decisions (SMS, phone, etc.)
  • Log message events

Nested Class Summary
static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdActivityEventHandler
          Interface which supports custom callback to be invoked when ad view is attached to or detached from an activity (window), and when a banner ad view "expands" in any way (MRAID expand, resize, or interstitial display), and closes back again.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdDownloadEventHandler
          The interface for ad download events.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.FeatureSupportHandler
          Interface allowing application developers to control which device features are exposed to rich media ads.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.LogEventHandler
          Interface for log event support allowing an application developer to augment or replace the logging behavior of the SDK.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.RichmediaEventHandler
          Interface for rich media (MRIAD) event handler, invoked when MRAID events such as resize, expand, close, etc.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.ThirdPartyEventHandler
          Interface for third party ad requests, with an onThirdPartyEvent() method invoked when client-side third party ad requests are received by the SDK.
